definition: marked by or causing boisterous merriment or convulsive laughter, sharp piercing cry
details:
adjective
- marked by or causing boisterous merriment or convulsive laughter
= synonyms: hilarious
- so extremely intense as to evoke screams
- resembling a scream in effect
noun
- sharp piercing cry
= example: sharp piercing cry
= synonyms: scream
- a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry
= synonyms: scream
